credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Pump, inscribed "The Boyer. Chicago Pneumatic Tool Co."
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: In the shape of a cylindrical pump, inscribed "The Boyer" on one side, "Chicago Pneumatic Tool Co., Chicago, Ill." inscribed on the opposite side. Upper part or handle opens as lid, hinged on back. Small striker on bottom tip.
name: Matchsafe
